title: Paul Theroux - Novels, Stories & Travel Writings (25 books)
description:
PAUL THEROUX (b. 1941) is an American travel writer and novelist, whose best known work of travel writing is perhaps THE GREAT RAILWAY BAZAAR (1975).  He has published numerous works of fiction, some of which were made into feature films.  He was awarded the 1981 James Tait Black Memorial Prize for his novel THE MOSQUITO COAST on which the 1986 movie is based.

This collection supplements the one uploaded by @nepalifiction, which contains a number of additional titles and is available here: <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10828957/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10828957/</a>  


The following books are in PDF format unless otherwise indicated:


                            == Novels & Short Stories ==

* THE BLACK HOUSE (Penguin, 1986)

* THE COLLECTED STORIES (Viking, 1997)

* THE CONSUL'S FILE (Houghton Mifflin, 1977)

* A DEAD HAND: A Crime in Calcutta (McClelland & Stewart, 2009) -- ePUB

* THE ELEPHANTA SUITE (McClelland & Stewart, 2007) -- ePUB

* GIRLS AT PLAY (Houghton Mifflin, 1969)

* HALF MOON STREET: Two Short Novels (Houghton Mifflin, 1984)

* HOTEL HONOLULU (Houghton Mifflin, 2001)

* JUNGLE LOVERS (Houghton Mifflin, 1971)

* KOWLOON TONG (Houghton Mifflin, 1998)

* THE MOSQUITO COAST (Houghton Mifflin, 1982) -- PDF + ePUB

* MURDER IN MOUNT HOLLY (Mysterious Press, 1969) -- ePUB

* MY OTHER LIFE (Houghton Mifflin, 1996) -- PDF + ePUB

* MY SECRET HISTORY (G. P. Putnam's, 1989) -- PDF + ePUB

* O-ZONE (Ballantine, 1986)

* PICTURE PALACE (Houghton Mifflin, 1978)

* SAINT JACK (Houghton Mifflin, 1973)

* WALDO (Ballantine, 1989)


                            == Non-fiction ==

* FRESH AIR FIEND: Travel Writings, 1985-2000 (Houghton Mifflin, 2000) -- ePUB

* THE GREAT RAILWAY BAZAAR: By Train Through Asia (Penguin, 1977) -- ePUB

* THE KINGDOM BY THE SEA: A Journey Around Great Britain (Houghton Mifflin, 1983) -- PDF + ePUB

* THE OLD PATAGONIAN EXPRESS: By Train Through the Americas (Penguin, 2008) -- ePUB

* SAILING THROUGH CHINA (Houghton Mifflin, 1984).  Illustrated by Patrick Procktor

* SIR VIDIA'S SHADOW: A Friendship Across Five Continents (Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, 1999) -- ePUB

* SUNRISE WITH SEAMONSTERS: A Paul Theroux Reader (Houghton Mifflin, 1985) -- PDF + ePUB
